resources.string: By checking this box, the Smart Notification Mode will be triggered.\n Smart Notification is a function designed to keep you from being disturbed by excessive notifications, and also to extend your battery life. It intelligently detects whether you are interacting with the phone or not, and temporarily block your notifications when you are not likely to check them by shutting down the radio.\n Don\'t worry you won\'t lose any notifications. The radio will be recovered automatically and blocked notifications will show up once you come back to the phone.
